data.text: Starting the last month of the year on a high! ✈️ We have just welcomed two new @Airbus A220-300 jets, registered as YL-ABK and YL-ABL in @riga_airport this morning. This delivery marks 37th and 38th Airbus aircraft for airBaltic, holding the youngest aircraft fleet in Europe! https://t.co/fau0vPsUBR

data.text:
The last Baltic Outlook issue of 2022 is available online and on board! ✈️ In the December issue get to know Hamburg - a city that has grown from a successful port city to a cultural metropolis that honours its history and heritage.
👉 More stories await: https://t.co/0nE7vZDk0z https://t.co/Eb523qvytO

urls.title: Baltic Outlook magazine | airBaltic
urls.description: Be they adventurous backpackers or sophisticated voyagers, the monthly Baltic Outlook magazine is an excellent resource for any kind of travellers.

data.text: We are glad to connect with other aviation professionals participating in the @CAPA_Aviation World Aviation Summit 2022, where our CEO @Gaussm took part in a keynote interview and a panel discussion: https://t.co/a7IlWIRefE https://t.co/pq3Mxp7zMT

urls.title: airBaltic Speaks at Silicon Valley Summit 2022
urls.description: Martin Gauss, President and CEO of the airline, participated in a keynote, sharing airBaltic story of its second NFT collection Planies.

data.text: In the first nine months of 2022, airBaltic group has recorded positive business indicators and achieved EUR 362.5 million in revenue - 172% more than in 2021. The pre-exceptional net income for the third quarter of 2022 has grown to EUR 17.1 million: https://t.co/aV4nWD3SGk https://t.co/9j0Encw5d1

urls.title: airBaltic Net Profit of EUR 17.1 Million in Q3 of 2022
urls.description: The pre-exceptional net income for the third quarter of 2022 has grown to EUR 17.1 million.

data.text: The most popular destinations for the upcoming winter season are Vienna, Munich and Tenerife! 🌍 At the same time, London, Paris, Copenhagen and Amsterdam remain among the most popular year-round routes ✈️ Read more about travel during the holiday season: https://t.co/4jDmMe0ly9 https://t.co/mPZNpIpV5I

urls.title: Top Winter Destinations – Vienna, Munich and Tenerife
urls.description: Reservations during the period of the winter solstice and New Year have reached more than 60%, compared to the year before.

data.text: More than a million airBaltic Club loyalty points have been issued for @PlaniesNFT! ✈️ Since the launch over 2300 Planies have been purchased. After being staked on the staking platform, the owners have passively earned points & other benefits. Check out: https://t.co/sJsm9vnZmL https://t.co/I7t1c9sZUD

urls.title: Planies NFT Club: The first Web3 travel community
urls.description: Discover unique and original NFT Planie artwork created by airBaltic. Buy, sell and trade special cartoon aircraft design collection of 10 000 digital collectibles stored on the Ethereum (ETH) blockchain and enjoy travel benefits as part of airBaltic Club loyalty program.

data.text: Daudz laimes, Latvija! 🇱🇻 https://t.co/mGCIppmMSF

Today, in honour of 104th anniversary of Proclamation Day of the Republic of Latvia, we will take part in the parade with a unique low pass flight over Latvia's capital Riga! Very soon our pilots will take flight with our Airbus A220-300 Latvian flag livery - look up! 🇱🇻

data.text: Atzīmējot Latvijas Republikas proklamēšanas 104. gadadienu, ar patiesu godu piedalīsimies svinīgajā parādē, veicot unikālu zemo pārlidojumu pāri Daugavai! Pavisam drīz mūsu piloti veiks lidojumu ar mūsu Airbus A220-300 sarkanbaltsarkanajā krāsojumā virs Rīgas - skaties augšup!🇱🇻 https://t.co/Kdk72kuidn

🎫 Book 15.11.2022 - 29.11.2022
✈️ Travel 12.12.2022 - 15.06.2023 https://t.co/xVRtI9kri3

data.text: Today 13 students finished their studies at the airBaltic Pilot Academy, receiving a commercial pilot license 🎓 In addition, we welcomed 15 new students, who began their professional pilot studies. Congratulations to our graduates and new students on reaching new milestones! 💚 https://t.co/FpzDUoVkFc

Šodien mēs varam stāvēt uz brīvas zemes. Esam mūžīgi pateicīgi saviem varoņiem, kuri cīnījās par neatkarīgu Latviju mums visiem. Sveicam latviešu tautu Lāčplēša dienā! 🇱🇻
📷 https://t.co/MUQQVxBsjD https://t.co/bVS7v0xADF

data.text: ❗️ LAST DAY of our biggest, most marvelous sale GRABOUT 2023! 😱 More than 20 wonderful destinations are still available, use your chance and make new memories for three prices only 17€, 27€ and 47€: https://t.co/QH6GDTJpgp https://t.co/QXkPX2WMvo

urls.title: Grabout 2023 has started!
urls.description: Flights to all airBaltic destinations are now available at incredibly cheap prices.

data.text: During October 2022, we carried 331 500 passengers in around 3 450 flights ✈️ That’s 38% more than during the same period last year! Let’s continue our adventures together 💚: https://t.co/LR4dOFza3X https://t.co/Rh3pJG5NQf

urls.title: airBaltic Carries 38% More Passengers in October
urls.description: In October 2022, airBaltic performed 3 450 flights – by 10% more than in October 2021.

data.text: Take a look inside our beautiful first landing in Marrakesh! 🇲🇦 The warm welcome and the exciting promise of stepping into a new world shine through the screen 🌅 Add mesmerizing Marrakesh to your travel list & visit the city makes your senses come alive: https://t.co/zcxAIbccbS https://t.co/3eeMeb7viv

urls.title: Flights to Marrakesh | airBaltic
urls.description: Book cheap flights from Riga to Marrakesh with airBaltic. Take a short, direct flight from Riga to Marrakesh and experience all that Morocco has to offer!

data.text: Continuing to lead conversations about diversity in aviation! ✈️ We were honored to join @IATA Wings of Change Europe 2022 conference in Istanbul where our CEO @Gaussm hosted a panel discussion on how diversity and inclusion can drive business growth: https://t.co/34w8J6VE2O https://t.co/H5EHlCxBao

data.text:

🌐 Read more about Morocco and other travel stories: https://t.co/m2iAH71AGY https://t.co/VTTSLn49aa

data.text: Our grand sale GRABOUT 2023 is still surprising people with its amazing deals! 🤩 The hottest destinations might be sold out, however, there are many gems still waiting for adventure seekers ✈️ Is one of these calling your name? 👀 Check out: https://t.co/dyVew3MpTY https://t.co/2A5LvvEiTf

data.text: Šodien kopā ar partneriem īstenosim pilna mēroga ārkārtas situācijas apmācības starptautiskajā lidostā “Liepāja”. Tajās pārbaudīsim sadarbību starp lidsabiedrību, lidostu un valsts ārkārtas dienestiem - apmācības airBaltic ikdienas darbību neietekmēs: https://t.co/rtoi1n0PI7 https://t.co/HaM5Sm1iQb

urls.title: airBaltic and Liepāja Airport to Host Emergency Response Training
urls.description: The goal of it is to examine the cooperation with airport and all State emergency services.

data.text:

✈️ Multiple destinations with outstanding prices are still available: https://t.co/T4njynOiDL https://t.co/OLbcFxMXVA

data.text: Another great news for our passengers - today we had our first-ever flight to Gran Canaria! 🌴 A new addition to our island jewels, it is the perfect getaway for Atlantic coast lovers 🥰️ Direct flights are available twice a week: https://t.co/wV8Z94v9Gm https://t.co/H7Xx6zQTXa

data.text: Join the grand opening of our first-ever flight to Africa, the spectacular Marrakesh! 🇲🇦 This new destination will steal the 💚 of any nature lover, adventure seeker, and culture fan! The pearl of North Africa can be reached with a direct ✈️ twice a week: https://t.co/Uwr1jHiQdl https://t.co/XDZoAf0DY9

urls.title: Flights to Marrakesh | airBaltic
urls.description: Book cheap flights from Riga to Marrakesh with airBaltic. Take a short, direct flight from Riga to Marrakesh and experience all that Morocco has to offer!

data.text: 👉 Come along and follow our first flight to Marrakesh on @Flightradar24 here: https://t.co/cuhIWcoFgD

urls.title: Live Flight Tracker - Real-Time Flight Tracker Map | Flightradar24
urls.description: View flight BT775 from Riga to Marrakesh on Flightradar24

data.text: Our crew is ready for the first airBaltic flight to Marrakesh, Morocco! ✈️🇲🇦 This moment also marks our first-ever scheduled flight to Africa, and to make it even more special, First Officer Hicham will perform this flight to his home country 💚 https://t.co/tnLK9Pe9lv

When the witches go riding and airBaltic Airbus A220-300 is seen, the moon laughs and whispers 'tis near Halloween 🎃 Are you already in your spOooOky mOooOd? 👻

#airBaltic #Airbus #halloween https://t.co/TN2UrHSee4

data.text: The wait is over @PlaniesNFT have taken off and landed in airBaltic club! ✈️ Stake your Planie and receive 20 points per day by simply owning a Planie 💰 Spend points on payments for flights, vouchers, gift cards, reward flights and more! Join the family: https://t.co/sJsm9voxcj https://t.co/NIfB66zs5A

urls.title: Planies NFT Club: The first Web3 travel community
urls.description: Discover unique and original NFT Planie artwork created by airBaltic. Buy, sell and trade special cartoon aircraft design collection of 10 000 digital collectibles stored on the Ethereum (ETH) blockchain and enjoy travel benefits as part of airBaltic Club loyalty program.

data.text: In honour of airBaltic's 27th birthday, we asked our employees from 0 to 27 years of experience to share their feelings about what airBaltic really is to them. Our airBaltic family inspires us to achieve new heights every day with their trust and dedication 💚 Here's to 27! 🎉 https://t.co/HUmGW1pnGr
Always en route to new adventures ✈️ Where will your next flight take you? https://t.co/BLF9z0PFDJ

Since April we have been providing cargo operations from Kyiv, Ukraine by organising a multimodal mail transportation system in cooperation with Ukrposhta. Until September our cooperation has already carried over 400 tonnes of mail to various destinations: https://t.co/YFLJ4sP64b https://t.co/dbrIvvFhC6

urls.title: airBaltic carries over 400 tonnes of mail from Ukraine
urls.description: airBaltic has already carried a total weight of over 400 tonnes of mail from Ukraine to various destinations.

data.text: Attention to detail is impeccable @PlaniesNFT! 🔍 Even with over 180 traits available, each Planie feels like it was handcrafted ✈️ Whether it be the sparkle in their eyes or the upcoming airBaltic club benefits, we can't take our eyes off it 🤩 Read more: https://t.co/sJsm9vnZmL https://t.co/ayR9LSKEQQ

urls.title: Planies NFT Club: The first Web3 travel community

data.text: Until the 27th of October, use the opportunity to be flexible and choose CLASSIC tickets! 🎩 Save 20 € per one-way flight or 40 € round trip and get all the essentials included in the price: checked baggage, seat selection, airport check-in and more: https://t.co/DJXvAF9UXK https://t.co/BcLOoe3k11

urls.title: 40 € off CLASSIC tickets | airBaltic
urls.description: Book the flexible CLASSIC tickets and save 20 € per one-way flight or 40 € round trip. You can use the discount for flights to any airBaltic destination.

data.text: Did you know that October is our birthday month? 🎂 From just an average of 190 flights a month in 1995 to 3420 flights in September 2022, we have become the number one carrier in the Baltics by proudly performing more than 841 000 flights during these 27 years ✈️ https://t.co/2BDwAtB2Nz

Three eventful days at the Istanbul airshow where we put on our sunglasses to face the sun and showcase our @Airbus A220-300 in the best light possible ✈️ Thank you to all customers, international media and aviation professionals who visited our aircraft! https://t.co/xOLjNV4Zyb

data.text: Few days ago our @PlaniesNFT holders were able to see the beautiful and unique digital collectibles they minted! ✈️ It was truly exciting to check which traits out of the 180 each of them got. If you're a part of this adventure, share your #Planie and let's see the traits! 😍 https://t.co/bTR2Bzlvzm

Till 17th October choose your favourite seat with a 25% discount! Head to the section "My booking" and select the best seat! Whether it is a window seat or the aisle, you choose ✈️💺 https://t.co/EsWE0kDtIj

Good news for our dedicated airBaltic club members! 💚 We have introduced a new payment option by using your airBaltic club points! Now you’ll be able to use your collected points to either fully pay for the ticket or combine it with other payment types: https://t.co/azqMw4nA9L https://t.co/eyAgyZYonR

urls.title: airBaltic Introduces Loyalty Points Payment Option
urls.description: This option will allow the members of the Club to use their collected loyalty points for ticket purchase at airBaltic.com.

data.text: 27 years of airBaltic tails soaring in the skies - connecting people with destinations they need the most. Thank you for trusting us to be a part of your journey - whether traveling for family, business, or leisure - we are honored to carry you. https://t.co/0aUw8uK6aE

Proud @PlaniesNFT holders, gather around! ✈️ Today is the day you'll finally see which one of the beautiful 10 000 digital collectibles you minted 🌍 Check out the hangar & see which #PlaniesNFT made it to you!

💚If you haven't joined yet, don't miss out: https://t.co/vhY5h1eOlz https://t.co/9jQS7uCm9t

data.text: During the first month of autumn, September, we have carried 338 100 passengers in around 3 420 flights! ✈️ That's 45% more than during the same period last year: https://t.co/RHh827VNkd 🌍 https://t.co/IikTpvRLDz

urls.title: airBaltic Carries 45% More Passengers in September
urls.description: In September 2022, airBaltic performed 3 420 flights – by 15% more than in September 2021.

data.text: Informējam, ka skrejceļa gaismu sistēmas tehnisku traucējumu dēļ airBaltic lidojumu grafikā uz/no Rīgas lidostas šodien iespējamas izmaiņas. Lūdzam sekot līdzi informācijai par lidojumiem šeit: https://t.co/YkMzCDoJfs https://t.co/VbiJS9YznC

urls.title: Šodien ielido un izlido - Jaunākā lidojumu informācija
urls.description: Vienalga vai Jūs lido pats, vai arī plāno sagaidīt kādu personu lidostā, šeit atradīsi jaunāko informāciju par airBaltic lidojumiem, lai efektīvāk varētu saplānot savu laiku.

data.text: Due to technical malfunctions of the runway lighting system, schedule disruptions may occur at Riga Airport for airBaltic flights today. Follow the link for your flight status: https://t.co/4OhJpoXM6a https://t.co/SG43lkbcqJ

urls.title: Flight status | Live flight information | airBaltic
urls.description: Whether you are flying, or need to pick up a loved one or colleague at the airport, you can find the latest scheduled times in order to plan your day most efficiently!

data.text: The Supervisory Board members of airBaltic, delegated by both the state and the private investor, have agreed to extend agreements with the current Executive Board for the next term of office: https://t.co/gKLOMVAeOO https://t.co/aNY9h9u5zr

urls.title: airBaltic Supervisory Board Extends Agreement with Executive Board
urls.description: The executives have demonstrated the highest level of professionalism and dedication.

data.text: Greetings from Istanbul Airshow 2022! 👋 We are excited to share our experience with @Airbus A220-300 aircraft to customers, international media and public. Starting from April 2023, airBaltic will carry its passengers to and from Istanbul as a part of the 2023 schedule. https://t.co/86cwOohxzY

data.text:
Our @PlaniesNFT have taken off ✈️ To enhance our airBaltic Club loyalty programme, we have released #Planies - 10 000 digital collectibles!
🎫 Planies holders will receive 20 airBaltic Club points per day and redeem them for flights and other benefits.
👉 https://t.co/IcOw7xV9fa https://t.co/iupciQmUas

urls.title: Planies NFT Club: The first Web3 travel community
urls.description: Discover unique and original NFT Planie artwork created by airBaltic. Buy, sell and trade special cartoon aircraft design collection of 10 000 digital collectibles stored on the Ethereum (ETH) blockchain and enjoy travel benefits as part of airBaltic Club loyalty program.

data.text: On October 1, 1995, we operated our first ever commercial flight from Riga to Stockholm with an aircraft that had just 33 seats. Now, 27 years, 50 million passengers and 2000 employees later, we're incredibly grateful to connect Baltics to the world! ✈️ https://t.co/DMTFvA4fxh

Great news for airBaltic club members! We have started a new loyalty program cooperation with @KLM and @airfrance. This partnership will offer the club members earn and spend loyalty points on codeshare flights operated by KLM or Air France: https://t.co/L5CRML4M0r https://t.co/BFFl9RWHBF

urls.title: Largest number of new routes – airBaltic announces 18 new routes
urls.description: The Latvian airline airBaltic has today published its flight schedule for the upcoming summer season next year, which will begin at the end of March 2023.

data.text: Have you packed a bag for your next trip? Maybe this offer will inspire you to pack more - until Monday you can add checked baggage with a 20% discount 🧳️ https://t.co/Lfqk8uMUfx

Meet our NEW routes 👇

📍 #RIGA 🇱🇻 to Istanbul 🇹🇷, Porto 🇵🇹, Burgas 🇧🇬, Bilbao 🇪🇸, Yerevan 🇦🇲, Bucharest 🇷🇴, Baku 🇦🇿, Tivat 🇲🇪, Belgrade 🇷🇸, Hannover🇩🇪
📍 #TALLINN 🇪🇪 to Heraklion, Rhodes 🇬🇷, Split, Dubrovnik🇭🇷
📍 #VILNIUS 🇱🇹 to Malaga, Palma de Mallorca 🇪🇸, Nice 🇫🇷, Heraklion🇬🇷

🎉 We're incredibly excited to announce the largest number of NEW routes in airBaltic history!
At the end of March 2023, we plan to launch 18 NEW ROUTES from the Baltics.

✈️ Book our new destinations today: https://t.co/mEM2j7fYLW https://t.co/V9GbrLlwCI

data.text: We're incredibly honoured to receive the Skytrax award for the Best Airline in Eastern Europe in 2022 🏆 What makes this award special is that it is based on the recognition from our passengers who truly enjoy the airBaltic experience ✈️💚 https://t.co/lJg2aVxTH9

We are happy to kick off the third season of the internal airBaltic Leaders for Future (ALFA) program! Today airBaltic employees gather to celebrate it with a knowledge-sharing event about the future of work and emerging trends: https://t.co/rJASs3Vn2h https://t.co/LFwjeXl71H

urls.title: airBaltic celebrates third season of its internal leadership program – ALFA
urls.description: The Latvian airline airBaltic celebrates the start of the third season of its internal airBaltic Leaders for Future (ALFA) program in an educational and knowledge-sharing event on the future of work and emerging trends in employee retention and belonging.

data.text: During the first eight months of 2022, the number of mobile bookings has more than doubled compared to the same period last year! 📱🌍 In total, 30% of all reservations made on the airBaltic website were done on a mobile device: https://t.co/mdG6Bk5j2d https://t.co/GVFy2Ne49b

urls.title: airBaltic doubles number of mobile bookings compared to 2021
urls.description: Latvian airline airBaltic reports that during the first eight months of 2022, the number of mobile bookings has more than doubled compared to the same period last year.

data.text: To better understand how exactly an engineer's daily life looks like, we caught up with our colleague Aleksandrs who took us behind the aviation scenes 🔧 Watch the video and check out the latest aircraft maintenance vacancies on our career page! ✈️ https://t.co/YR5Xccue3m https://t.co/QrZIiPuJ3N

urls.title: Aircraft Technicians

data.text: We're lucky to be surrounded by incredible people 💚 Every year we thank our long-term employees for their loyalty and dedication. They have been with us for 10, 15, 20, and even 25 years, and it is amazing to see that love for aviation is still in the air ✈️ To many more years! https://t.co/yItSIpyXNZ

We have published our flight schedule from Tampere for the upcoming winter season which will start on October 31, 2022 ✈️ The highlight of our upcoming Tampere winter schedule are our first-ever daily flights from Tampere to Amsterdam! Read more here: https://t.co/mZTSDlLB0i https://t.co/mrLXEqvqUJ

urls.title: airBaltic adds daily flights from Tampere to Amsterdam for winter season
urls.description: airBaltic has published its flight schedule for the upcoming winter season that will start on October 31, 2022. The airline plans to connect Tampere to five destinations, offering its first-ever daily flights from Tampere to Amsterdam.

data.text: We keep on growing! Yesterday we welcomed our 2000th employee at the airBaltic headquarters, reaching the all-time highest count since the founding of the airline in 1995 ✈️ We're thankful to have such a professional and highly motivated team that takes us to the sky! https://t.co/rtW48QGKyZ

data.text: We are fortunate to witness the passion for aviation being passed down through generations by the incredible dads of airBaltic. Happy Father’s Day from our airBaltic family to yours 💚 https://t.co/iLnjc7D9ZW

data.text: During the sunlit month of August, we have carried 386 500 passengers! ✈️ That's by 38% more than during the same period last year. We want to thank all the passengers who trusted us with their travels and continued to choose us through this season: https://t.co/E0BNXRgd9f https://t.co/E1NIdE1GTE

urls.title: airBaltic carries 38% more passengers in August
urls.description: During August 2022, Latvian airline airBaltic has carried 386 500 passengers or by 38% more than during the same period last year. In August 2022, airBaltic performed 3 690 flights – by 20% more than in August 2021.

data.text: Fulfill all your little and big travel dreams! ⛅️💚 Book your next one of a kind adventure and get swept off your feet with our GREEN sale deals starting from 29€: https://t.co/ubjqpJoFWU https://t.co/v7odt0Jwn5

data.text: Today 8 students graduated from airBaltic Pilot Academy, receiving a commercial pilot license upon completion of the full-time airline transport pilot program!✈️ In addition, the largest group of 15 new students, began their professional pilot studies: https://t.co/xoSIyERORh https://t.co/vPGerA5zfD

urls.title: 8 students graduate airBaltic Pilot Academy
urls.description: On September 5, 2022, 8 students graduated from the Latvian airline’s airBaltic Pilot Academy, receiving a commercial pilot license upon completion of the full-time airline transport pilot program.

data.text:
The emotions say it all 🎉💚 We want to say 50 million thank-yous to all our passengers, employees and everyone else who made this milestone possible.
A special thank you goes to our partners @citi_zeni for making us dance and host Renārs Zeltiņš for the wonderful atmosphere! 🎵 https://t.co/kxt1bpYySA
Take your hobbies with you to your next adventure! 🏄‍♂️️⛳️🎣 Just this weekend book your ticket and add sports equipment with a 30% discount: https://t.co/mcGOEP1zBP https://t.co/iSLpT9h7Nw

data.text: Happy 1st of September to everyone starting or continuing their educational growth 📚 May this new school year bring lots of curiosity and inspiration to learn more!✍️ To our Pilot Academy students who are making their way to their wings, only blue skies and tailwinds for you! ✈️ https://t.co/iK2tRTJ47U

Due to increased travel demand, the unaudited consolidated financial results of airBaltic group for the first six months of 2022 show a significantly increased revenue of EUR 191.5 million – 270% more than the same period last year: https://t.co/MizffFTnCJ https://t.co/hsMWjeQxtK

urls.title: airBaltic increases revenue threefold in the first half of 2022
urls.description: Due to increased travel demand, the unaudited consolidated financial results of airBaltic group for the first six months of 2022 show a significantly increased revenue of EUR 191.5 million – 270% more than the same period last year.

data.text: Today we welcomed our 50 millionth passenger! 🥳 This day was filled with lots of smiles, joy and “thank-yous”. The biggest thank you goes out to all the passengers who have been a part of this significant milestone 💚 To many more happy flights together: https://t.co/29yNIlgZTv https://t.co/TSCeAL1Z0n

urls.title: airBaltic welcomes its 50 millionth passenger
urls.description: Today, on August 31, the Latvian airline airBaltic welcomed its 50 millionth passenger since the founding of the airline in 1995.

data.text:

data.text: Love for aviation tends to grow on the people around you, so today we were happy to share it with the little ones at our annual Family Day event 💚 From visiting the hangars to trying their luck in the Airbus A220-300 simulator, every place was met with curious, sparkling eyes 🤩 https://t.co/dvAXG5t4LT

data.text:
Today, 33 years ago, two million people from Baltic countries came together and united hand in hand to create a Chain of Freedom - the Baltic Way. Let this day always remind the strength of our Baltic spirit and the importance of freedom 🇪🇪🇱🇻🇱🇹

📸 Kārlis Dambrāns https://t.co/ElhffgmIdT

There are still a few days left to make this summer last longer! 🌞 Plan your autumn getaways and book your flights for very special prices 👉 https://t.co/1rs8zE5nWm

data.text: 5 incredible days, 80 000 curious visitors and countless memories - that's Farnborough International Airshow 2022 ✈️ We would like to thank everyone for showing interest in our Airbus A220-300 and welcoming airBaltic in one of the largest airshows in the world! #FIA2022 https://t.co/p6MbZYD6vS

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Category
domain.description: A grouping of interests and hobbies entities, like Novelty Food or Destinations

domain.name: Product Taxonomy
domain.description: A product taxonomy for labeling categories of products.

data.text:
Our Cherry SALE is here so you can enjoy the extra sunshine or make plans for your winter holidays! 🍒 Book flights at cherry-licious prices to all destinations up until next spring: https://t.co/GE0GBY2PGv

🎫 Book: 26.07.2022 - 09.08.2022
✈️ Travel: 16.08.2022 - 27.03.2023 https://t.co/CUshaQKcqe

urls.title: Cherry deals are here!
urls.description: Great cherry prices for flights up until next spring!

data.text: A moment when the worries slip away and the excitement of new adventures sets in! ✈️✨ https://t.co/SKQz0HqAbt

Our path toward growth wouldn't be imaginable without strong partnerships. We are honoured to showcase our A220-300 aircraft at @FIAFarnborough and mark 10 years of great teamwork with @Airbus #FIA2022 https://t.co/EoJtzHH703

data.text: We have started our last journey with Bombardier Q400 NextGen aircraft by redelivering them back to their lessor Nordic Aviation Capital ✈️ We thank the Bombardier fleet for being a part of our operations by connecting passengers all across our network: https://t.co/nAswv8e52s https://t.co/0ePQxLMIQJ

urls.title: airBaltic begins redelivery of its Q400 fleet
urls.description: airBaltic announces that on July 20th it started the redelivery process of its Bombardier Q400 NextGen aircraft back to their lessor

data.text: For your next vacation, you deserve everything and more! 💚 Till Monday, choose our CLASSIC tickets with a 15€ discount per one-way or 30€ for a round trip. Enjoy such benefits as seat selection, flight date change and in general more flexibility: https://t.co/6UmW82Fp0b https://t.co/VpMUgnAs1z
